001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util;
002
003import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
004
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
006
007public class ImageColors {
008    protected final int width;
009    protected final int height;
010    protected final int[] pixels;
011
012    public ImageColors(int width, int height, int[] pixels) {
013        this.width = width;
014        this.height = height;
015        this.pixels = pixels;
016    }
017
018    public ImageColors(ImageColors o) {
019        width = o.width;
020        height = o.height;
021        pixels = o.pixels.clone();
022    }
023
024    public int width() { return width; }
025    public int height() { return height; }
026    public int[] pixels() { return pixels; }
027
028    protected int index(double temp, double humid) {
029        temp = Numbers.clamp01(temp);
030        humid = Numbers.clamp01(humid);
031
032        humid *= temp;
033        int x = (int) ((1 - temp) * (width - 1));
034        int y = (int) ((1 - humid) * (height - 1));
035        return (y * width) + x;
036    }
037
038    public int get(double temp, double humid) {
039        return pixels[index(temp, humid)];
040    }
041
042    public static ImageColors load(BufferedImage image) {
043        int width = image.getWidth();
044        int height = image.getHeight();
045        int[] pixels = new int[width * height];
046        int i = 0;
047        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
048            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
049                pixels[i] = image.getRGB(x, y);
050                ++i;
051            }
052        }
053        return new ImageColors(width, height, pixels);
054    }
055}
